alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:28PM CDT until June 16 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CEDAR...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bennett, or 8 miles east of Tipton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wheatland, Massillon Park and Sherman Park around 1035 PM CDT. Calamus, Toronto and Walnut Grove Park around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grand Mound and Lost Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
